text: The Yuchi language is the language of the Tsohaya. ==Notes== ==Works cited== * * * * * * * * * ==Other websites== *The Euchee Language Project *Yuchi Language Primer *Albert S. Gatschet's original list of Yuchi vocabulary (1878–1891) *Albert S. Gatschet's original list of Yuchi vocabulary (1832–1907) * *Joseph Mahan Collection , at Columbus State University Archives. Collection includes audio/visual recordings of Yuchi language (not yet available online) * *OLAC resources in and about the Yuchi language * gOnE Enû O’wAdAnA: A New Generation of Yuchi Speakers, Cultural Survival Category:Language isolates Category:Endangered languages Category:Native Americans
title: Yuchi language
